title: Writhing Remains
summaries: The Writhing Remains is a pet item that can be dropped by Eater of Worlds in Master Mode at a 25*1/4 (25%) chance. It summons a pet Eater of Worms. It acts similarly to The Deactivated Probe, which is the Master Mode pet of The Destroyer.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons the Eater of Worms
'It'll give you worms!'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
